item.title: Resources
item.description: CTFTime CTFTime is the authoritative source of all CTF competitions, including event listing, team ranking, and a centralized writeup directory. Tools Awesome CTF: List of CTF tools Day 18 Essential CTF Tools: List of CTF tools CyberChef: A swiss-army knife for data manipulation, including encoding / decoding, encryption / decryption, compression / decompression, and other ciphers and analyses PayloadsAllTheThings: “A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF” Activity-based Resources These are good places to start looking for challenges.
